Text: Thank you so much! And for everyone seeding, as well, big thanks.

loadstone2k12

The .srt subtitles are a nice touch.

I am collecting & repacking your uploads, therefore I feel obligated to seed even longer than normal.

My compliments on the excellent and so far consistent quality, and thanks!
